team.title: Ambitious pioneers.
team.description: Our team is a group of ambitious pioneers, passionate about making a better world through a more accessible and efficient financial system. We believe in working hard and playing hard, creating the highest quality products, experiences, relationships, and decisions guided by our culture of continuous learning, authenticity, and transparency.

felix.description: Investor at Turing Capital. Previously at Radius and 21.co.

alex.description: Previously at Square, Caviar, Apple, and Zynga.

justin.education: MS from Stanford & BS from UC Berkeley

anthony.description: Co-Founder of EthHub. Previously worked in cyber security.

dylan.description: Previously at Coins.ph and Code Chrysalis.

punia.description: Previously an investor at Draper Associates.
punia.education: BS from UC Berkeley, Haas School of Business

hiring.title: We’re Hiring
hiring.description: We are looking for outstanding technologists and operators to help us build the future of Set.

steve.description: Founder and Managing Director at Kindred Ventures

careers.title: Find your home at Set
careers.vision-description: We’re creating the foundation for the open financial system to flourish. We’re creating tools that empower developers, fund managers, and investors to interact with crypto compositions that are more valuable than their individual parts.
careers.who-we-are-description: We’re a passionate team of learners, raising the bar with everything we do. We believe in working hard and playing hard and creating meaningful products that make a positive impact in people’s lives.
